text: Adinandra forbesii is a species of plant in the Pentaphylacaceae family. It is endemic to New Guinea island, within the nation of Papua New Guinea, and in the Western New Guinea region of Indonesia. It is an IUCN Red List near- threatened species, endangered by habitat loss. ==References== forbesii Category:Endemic flora of New Guinea Category:Flora of Papua New Guinea Category:Flora of Western New Guinea Category:Trees of New Guinea Category:Near threatened flora of Asia Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Adinandra forbesii
